body:
You seem to have provided code for `masked_scatter_`. However, even for `masked_scatter_` your version does not replicate the behaviour of `masked_scatter_`, but that of `torch.where`.

```python
t_size = 10000
n = torch.rand(t_size)
n_ = n.clone()

mask = (torch.rand(t_size) > 0.5)
source = torch.rand(t_size)
n = torch.where(mask, source, n)

# what i expect masked_scatter_ to do
for i in range(len(mask)):
    if mask[i].item():
        n_[i] = source[i]

for i in range(len(n)):
    assert n[i] == n_[i]  # No assertion errors
```
